summary: This comedy / drama film follows the sexual exploits of teenager Jamie McGregor and the permissive society of the 60's.
cast: Barry Evans|Judy Geeson|Angela Scoular|Sheila White|Adrienne Posta|Vanessa Howard|Diane Keen|Moyra Fraser|Michael Bates|Maxine Audley|Denholm Elliott|Christopher Timothy|Nicky Henson|Allan Warren|Roy Holder|George Layton|Gareth Robinson|Oliver Cotton|Andrew Hamilton|Sally Avory|Erika Raffael|Cavan Kendall|Trevor Jones|Gillie Austin|Christopher Mitchell|Pauline Challoner|Mary Griffiths|Stella Kemball|Angela Pleasence|The Spencer Davis Group|Ann Barrass|Roy Beck|Spencer Davis|Terry Downes|Victor Harrington|Ray Marioni|Emile Stemmler|Paul Stewart|Marianne Stone|John Tatham|Larry Taylor|Lisa Thomas|Pearl Walters|Muff Winwood|Pete York
title: Here We Go Round the Mulberry Bush
